Plot: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?
Writer: Peter Stone (screenplay), Peter Stone (story), Marc Behm (story)
Title: Charade
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 8 nominations.
Actors: Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn, Walter Matthau, James Coburn
